mapper.insert: /* RoleAuthDao.insertRoleMenuAuth */ INSERT INTO TB_ROLE_MENU ( ROLEID, MENUID, UPDT_DT, UPDTUSERID, REG_DT, REGUSERID ) VALUES (#{roleid}, #{menuid}, NOW(), #{reguserid}, NOW(), #{reguserid} )
mapper.select: /* RoleauthDao.selectToproleidyn */ SELECT CASE WHEN UPPR_ROLEID = '0' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END TOPYN FROM TB_ROLE WHERE ROLEID = #{role_id}
mapper.update: /* RoleAuthDao.updateRoleJobUserMappedTerm */ UPDATE TB_ROLE_USER SET ROLE_STRT_DT = #{role_strt_dt}, ROLE_END_DT = #{role_end_dt}, UPDTUSERID = #{updtuserid}, UPDT_DT = NOW() WHERE ROLEID = #{roleid} AND USERID = #{userid}
/* RoleAuthDao.updateRoleInfo */ UPDATE TB_ROLE SET NM = #{nm}, DC = #{dc}, USE_YN = #{use_yn}, SE_CD = #{se_cd}, UPDTUSERID = #{updtuserid}, UPDT_DT = NOW() WHERE ROLEID = #{roleid}
mapper.select: /* RoleAuthDao.selectRoleSiteList */ SELECT SITEID, SITE_NM FROM TB_SITE WHERE SYS_SE_CD = #{se_cd} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: /* RoleAuthDao.insertRoleUser */ INSERT INTO TB_ROLE_USER (ROLEID, USERID, ROLE_STRT_DT, ROLE_END_DT, UPDT_DT, UPDTUSERID, REG_DT, REGUSERID) VALUES (#{roleid}, #{userid}, #{role_strt_dt}, #{role_end_dt}, NOW(), #{reguserid}, NOW(), #{reguserid})
mapper.delete: /* RoleAuthDao.deleteRoleUser */ DELETE FROM TB_ROLE_USER WHERE ROLEID=#{roleid} AND USERID=#{userid}

/* RoleAuthDao.selectUserList */
SELECT A.USERID, A.ACNT, A.USER_SE_CD, A.NM, A.UPDT_DT, B.ROLEID FROM TB_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ROLE_USER B ON A.USERID = B.USERID AND B.ROLEID = #{roleid} WHERE A.ACNT IS NOT NULL
AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
